faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about car rental

ageRestrictions.question: Are there age or driving experience restrictions?
ageRestrictions.answer: For almost all cars there are no age or experience restrictions. Check with the company manager.

deposit.question: Is a deposit required?
deposit.answer: The deposit directly depends on the car brand, please check with the company manager.

mileageRestrictions.question: Are there mileage restrictions and can I travel outside the country?
mileageRestrictions.answer: There are mileage restrictions - no more than 200km per day, to remove restrictions on the car page in the "Additional services" section you need to activate the "Unlimited mileage" option. When traveling to other countries the car cost increases and its possibility is discussed with the manager.

earlyReturn.question: Is it possible to return the car early?
earlyReturn.answer: Yes, it is possible to return it early, but upon early return of the car, money is NOT refunded.

advancePayment.question: Is an advance payment required when booking a car?
advancePayment.answer: Yes, an advance payment is an integral part of the car booking process. The advance amount consists of 20% of the total cost of the car + options you selected for the rental period. It is important to understand that the advance is NOT refunded under any circumstances.

insurance.question: Are the cars insured?
insurance.answer: Yes, the car is insured with mandatory RCA insurance. At the renter's request, full CASCO insurance can be arranged for a fee (from 25€ per day).

carWash.question: Car wash and fueling
carWash.answer: When you choose a car, you pay for its wash. If you return the car clean, the wash fee is refunded. The car must be returned with the same amount of fuel as it had at the time of rental.

delivery.question: Is delivery available?
delivery.answer: Yes, delivery is possible and can be arranged on the car's page in the "How to pick up the car" section, where you can select an option or enter an address. Delivery to the Airport costs 20€. For other addresses, the delivery cost is calculated based on the distance from our office in kilometers, multiplied by 2€. Example: 11 km from the office to your location would cost 22€.

restrictions.question: What restrictions and sanctions exist for violating the rules?
restrictions.answer: It is forbidden to accelerate above 120km/h and to smoke in the cabin - fine 50€ for each such violation. It is forbidden to transport animals in the cabin without special equipment (container or kennel) - fine 100€. For aggressive driving - fine 300€ with subsequent immediate confiscation of the vehicle.

validation.invalidDateRange: Return date must be after pickup date
validation.phoneInvalid: Phone number must contain exactly 9 digits (0 + operator code + number)
